content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step according to the workflow: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** Looking at the document, I can extract the following text: - DOCUPRINT S.A.S. - NIT. 800.194.997-1 - EL SUSCRITO CONTADOR PUBLICO CERTIFICA QUE - La composición accionaria de la empresa DOCUPRINT S.A.S NIT 800.194.997-1 según registros contables a 31 de Diciembre de 2019 presenta lo siguiente - SOCIO / CC o NIT / ACCIONES VR NOMINAL / VR CAPITAL PAGADO - CARLOS A. MOLINA SUAREZ / 12.119.319 / 1170 / 100.000 / 117.000.000 - FAST PRINT LTDA / 800.149.757 / 1170 / 100.000 / 117.000.000 - TOTALES / 2340 / 200.000 / 234.000.000 - Se expide la presente certificación en la ciudad de Medellín Enero 09 de 2020 para trámites legales - JAIRO DE JESUS ZAPATA VALENCIA - CC 15.501.332 de Copacabana - Contador Público TP 9899-T - Contact information at bottom 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** - Not BLANK: has significant content - Not LINK_ONLY: no hyperlinks/URLs redirecting 3. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** The main purpose of this document is to certify the shareholding composition of DOCUPRINT S.A.S. It shows: - Partners/shareholders (CARLOS A. MOLINA SUAREZ and FAST PRINT LTDA) - Number of shares (acciones) - Nominal value - Paid capital - Total shareholding structure I see two shareholders have equal contributions of 1,170 shares, each valued at 100,000, totaling 117,000,000 in paid capital. The total shareholding reaches 2,340 shares with 234,000,000 in total paid capital. 4. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** The document is issued by a public accountant (Contador Público) on behalf of the company itself, certifying the shareholding composition based on accounting records. This is NOT issued by a commercial registry authority or tax authority, but by the company's accountant -> ACC Indicative 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** This document clearly fits the ACC category because: - Shows shareholding composition with specific data (number of shares, capital contributions) - Contains terminology like "composición accionaria", "acciones", "capital pagado" - Shows percentage information through the shareholding details , confirming ownership structure - Validates ownership percentages through professional accounting certification The document provides a precise breakdown of company ownership, demonstrating who controls the corporate equity through professional accounting verification.
